Title: GEA QBOIL: From pilot project to industrial benchmark â€“ up to 35% less energy consumption in wort boiling
Summary: At drinktec 2025, GEA will showcase the advanced QBOIL wort boiling system. Since its introduction at BrauBeviale 2023, the system has undergone practical trials and has now been successfully implemented in industrial reference plants. The results confirm the efficiency of GEA QBOIL in the most energy-intensive step of brewing: wort heating and boiling.

Title: GEA unveils a new generation of flexible, modular beverage filling technology at drinktec 2025
Summary: GEA is introducing a new generation of filling technology at drinktec 2025: a modular, service-friendly filler engineered for high-performance beverage production in an increasingly diverse and demanding market. With an upgraded hygienic design and smart features such as AI-assisted interfaces, it aims to boost line efficiency, uptime and daily operations.
